00058 #define HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN \
00059   do { \
00060     DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction(); \
00061     try
00062 
00063 #define HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(_cb_) \
00064     catch (Exception &e) { \
00065       if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
00066         if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
00067           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00068         else \
00069           HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
00070         txn->abort(); \
00071         _cb_->error(e.code(), e.what()); \
00072         return; \
00073       } \
00074       HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
00075       poll(0, 0, (System::rand32() % 3000) + 1); \
00076       continue; \
00077     } \
00078     break; \
00079   } while (true)
00080 
00081 #define HT_BDBTXN_END(...) \
00082     catch (Exception &e) { \
00083       if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
00084         if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
00085           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00086         else \
00087           HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
00088         txn->abort(); \
00089         return __VA_ARGS__; \
00090       } \
00091       HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
00092       poll(0, 0, (System::rand32() % 3000) + 1); \
00093       continue; \
00094     } \
00095     break; \
00096   } while (true)

00105 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, PropertiesPtr &props,
00106                ServerKeepaliveHandlerPtr &keepalive_handler)
00107     : m_verbose(false), m_next_handle_number(1), m_next_session_id(1) {
00108 
00109   m_verbose = props->get_bool("verbose");
00110   m_lease_interval = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00111   m_keep_alive_interval = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval");
00112 
00113   Path base_dir(props->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Dir"));
00114 
00115   if (!base_dir.is_complete())
00116     base_dir = Path(System::install_dir) / base_dir;
00117 
00118   m_base_dir = base_dir.directory_string();
00119 
00120   if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00121     HT_WARNF("Unable to open base directory '%s' - %s - will create.",
00122              m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00123     if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_base_dir.c_str())) {
00124       HT_ERRORF("Unable to create base directory %s - %s",
00125                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00126       exit(1);
00127     }
00128     if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00129       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open base directory %s - %s",
00130                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00131       exit(1);
00132     }
00133   }
00134 
00138   if (flock(m_base_fd, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB) != 0) {
00139     if (errno == EWOULDBLOCK) {
00140       HT_ERRORF("Base directory '%s' is locked by another process.",
00141                 m_base_dir.c_str());
00142     }
00143     else {
00144       HT_ERRORF("Unable to lock base directory '%s' - %s",
00145                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00146     }
00147     exit(1);
00148   }
00149 
00150   m_bdb_fs = new BerkeleyDbFilesystem(m_base_dir);
00151 
00155   get_generation_number();
00156 
00157   NodeDataPtr root_node = new NodeData();
00158   root_node->name = "/";
00159   m_node_map["/"] = root_node;
00160 
00161   uint16_t port = props->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00162   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00163 
00164   m_keepalive_handler_ptr.reset(
00165       new ServerKeepaliveHandler(conn_mgr->get_comm(), this));
00166   keepalive_handler = m_keepalive_handler_ptr;
00167 }

00170 Master::~Master() {
00171   delete m_bdb_fs;
00172   ::close(m_base_fd);
00173 }

00176 uint64_t Master::create_session(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00177   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00178   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00179   uint64_t session_id = m_next_session_id++;
00180   session_data = new SessionData(addr, m_lease_interval, session_id);
00181   m_session_map[session_id] = session_data;
00182   m_session_heap.push_back(session_data);
00183   return session_id;
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 bool Master::get_session(uint64_t session_id, SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00188   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00189   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00190   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00191     return false;
00192   session_data = (*iter).second;
00193   return true;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void Master::destroy_session(uint64_t session_id) {
00197   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00198   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00199   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00200   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00201     return;
00202   session_data = (*iter).second;
00203   m_session_map.erase(session_id);
00204   session_data->expire();
00205   // force it to top of expiration heap
00206   boost::xtime_get(&session_data->expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 int Master::renew_session_lease(uint64_t session_id) {
00211   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00212 
00213   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00214   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00215     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00216 
00217   if (!(*iter).second->renew_lease())
00218     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00219 
00220   return Error::OK;
00221 }
00222 
00223 bool Master::next_expired_session(SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00224   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00225   struct LtSessionData ascending;
00226   boost::xtime now;
00227 
00228   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00229 
00230   if (m_session_heap.size() > 0) {
00231     std::make_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00232     if (m_session_heap[0]->is_expired(now)) {
00233       session_data = m_session_heap[0];
00234       std::pop_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00235       m_session_heap.resize(m_session_heap.size()-1);
00236       m_session_map.erase(session_data->id);
00237       return true;
00238     }
00239   }
00240   return false;
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00247 void Master::remove_expired_sessions() {
00248   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00249   int error;
00250   std::string errmsg;
00251 
00252   while (next_expired_session(session_data)) {
00253 
00254     if (m_verbose) {
00255       HT_INFOF("Expiring session %llu", (Llu)session_data->id);
00256     }
00257 
00258     session_data->expire();
00259 
00260     {
00261       ScopedLock slock(session_data->mutex);
00262       HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00263       foreach(uint64_t handle, session_data->handles) {
00264         if (m_verbose) {
00265           HT_INFOF("Destroying handle %llu", (Llu)handle);
00266         }
00267         if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg, false)) {
00268           HT_ERRORF("Problem destroying handle - %s (%s)",
00269                     Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00270         }
00271       }
00272       session_data->handles.clear();
00273     }
00274   }
00275 
00276 }

00282 void Master::create_handle(uint64_t *handlep, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00283   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00284   *handlep = ++m_next_handle_number;
00285   handle_data = new HandleData();
00286   handle_data->id = *handlep;
00287   handle_data->locked = false;
00288   m_handle_map[*handlep] = handle_data;
00289 }
00290 
00294 bool Master::get_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00295   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00296   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00297   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00298     return false;
00299   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00300   return true;
00301 }
00302 
00306 bool Master::remove_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00307   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00308   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00309   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00310     return false;
00311   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00312   m_handle_map.erase(iter);
00313   return true;
00314 }

00322 void
00323 Master::mkdir(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00324   std::string abs_name;
00325   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00326   std::string child_name;
00327 
00328   if (m_verbose) {
00329     HT_INFOF("mkdir(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00330   }
00331 
00332   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00333     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "directory '/' exists");
00334     return;
00335   }
00336 
00337   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00338 
00339   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00340     ScopedLock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00341 
00342     m_bdb_fs->mkdir(txn, name);
00343 
00344     txn->commit(0);
00345 
00346     // deliver event notifications
00347     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00348                                             child_name));
00349     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00350   }
00351   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00352 
00353   cb->response_ok();
00354 }

00361 void
00362 Master::unlink(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00363   std::string child_name;
00364   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00365   NodeDataPtr node;
00366 
00367   if (m_verbose) {
00368     HT_INFOF("unlink(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00369   }
00370 
00371   if (!strcmp(name, "/")) {
00372     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_PERMISSION_DENIED,
00373               "Cannot remove '/' directory");
00374     return;
00375   }
00376 
00377   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00378     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00379     return;
00380   }
00381 
00382   get_node(name, node);
00383   {
00384     boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(node->mutex);
00385     if (node->reference_count() > 0) {
00386       cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_OPEN,
00387                 "Reference count > 0");
00388       return;
00389     }
00390   }
00391 
00392   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00393 
00394   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00395     ScopedLock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00396 
00397     m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, name);
00398 
00399     txn->commit(0);
00400 
00401     // deliver event notifications
00402     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
00403                                                 child_name));
00404     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event_ptr);
00405   }
00406   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00407 
00408   cb->response_ok();
00409 }

00416 void
00417 Master::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name,
00418     uint32_t flags, uint32_t event_mask, std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00419   std::string child_name;
00420   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00421   NodeDataPtr node_data;
00422   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00423   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00424   bool created = false;
00425   bool is_dir = false;
00426   bool existed;
00427   uint64_t handle;
00428   bool lock_notifiy = false;
00429   uint32_t lock_mode = 0;
00430   uint64_t lock_generation = 0;
00431   bool create_notification_delivered = false;
00432 
00433   if (m_verbose) {
00434     HT_INFOF("open(session_id=%llu, fname=%s, flags=0x%x, event_mask=0x%x)",
00435              (Llu)session_id, name, flags, event_mask);
00436   }
00437 
00438   assert(name[0] == '/');
00439 
00440   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00441     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00442 
00443   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name))
00444     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00445 
00446   if (!init_attrs.empty() && !(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00447     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CREATE_FAILED,
00448              "initial attributes can only be supplied on CREATE");
00449 
00450   // If path name to open is "/", then create a dummy NodeData object for
00451   // the parent because the previous call will return the node itself as
00452   // the parent, causing the second of the following two mutex locks to hang
00453   if (!strcmp(name, "/"))
00454     parent_node = new NodeData();
00455 
00456   get_node(name, node_data);
00457 
00458   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00459     ScopedLock parent_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00460     ScopedLock node_lock(node_data->mutex);
00461 
00462     if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) {
00463       if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0)
00464         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00465       lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00466       if (node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00467         lock_notifiy = true;
00468     }
00469     else if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) {
00470       if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0 ||
00471           !node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00472         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00473       lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00474       lock_notifiy = true;
00475     }
00476 
00477     existed = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name, &is_dir);
00478 
00479     if (existed) {
00480       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE) && (flags & OPEN_FLAG_EXCL))
00481         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "mode=CREATE|EXCL");
00482 
00483       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP))
00484         HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "Unable to open TEMP file "
00485                   "'%s' because it already exists", name);
00486       // Read/create 'lock.generation' attribute
00487       if (node_data->lock_generation == 0) {
00488         if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00489                                      &node_data->lock_generation)) {
00490           node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00491           m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00492                                   node_data->lock_generation);
00493         }
00494       }
00495     }
00496     else {
00497       if (!(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00498         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00499 
00500       m_bdb_fs->create(txn, name, (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP));
00501       node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00502       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00503                               node_data->lock_generation);
00504       // Set the initial attributes
00505       for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++)
00506         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, name, init_attrs[i].name,
00507                             init_attrs[i].value, init_attrs[i].value_len);
00508       if (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP)
00509         node_data->ephemeral = true;
00510       created = true;
00511     }
00512 
00513     if (!handle_data)
00514       create_handle(&handle, handle_data);
00515 
00516     handle_data->node = node_data.get();
00517     handle_data->open_flags = flags;
00518     handle_data->event_mask = event_mask;
00519     handle_data->session_data = session_data;
00520 
00521     session_data->add_handle(handle);
00522 
00523     if (created && !create_notification_delivered) {
00524       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00525                                               child_name));
00526       deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00527       create_notification_delivered = true;
00528     }
00529 
00533     if (lock_mode != 0) {
00534       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00535       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00536                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00537       lock_generation = handle_data->node->lock_generation;
00538       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = lock_mode;
00539 
00540       lock_handle(handle_data, lock_mode);
00541 
00542       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00543       if (lock_notifiy) {
00544         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(lock_mode));
00545         deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00546       }
00547     }
00548 
00549     handle_data->node->add_handle(handle, handle_data);
00550 
00551     txn->commit(0);
00552   }
00553   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00554 
00555   cb->response(handle, created, lock_generation);
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00562 void Master::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00563   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00564   int error;
00565   std::string errmsg;
00566   size_t n;
00567 
00568   if (m_verbose) {
00569     HT_INFOF("close(session=%llu, handle=%llu)", (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00570   }
00571 
00572   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00573     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00574     return;
00575   }
00576 
00577   {
00578     ScopedLock slock(session_data->mutex);
00579     n = session_data->handles.erase(handle);
00580   }
00581 
00582   if (n) {
00583     if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg)) {
00584       cb->error(error, errmsg);
00585       return;
00586     }
00587   }
00588 
00589   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00590     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00591   }
00592 }

00595 
00599 void
00600 Master::attr_set(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00601                  const char *name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00602   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00603   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00604   int error;
00605 
00606   if (m_verbose) {
00607     HT_INFOF("attrset(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s, value_len=%d)",
00608              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name, (int)value_len);
00609   }
00610 
00611   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00612     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00613 
00614   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00615     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00616 
00617   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00618     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00619 
00620     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, value, value_len);
00621 
00622     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET, name));
00623     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00624 
00625     txn->commit(0);
00626   }
00627   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00628 
00629   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00630     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00631 }

00633 
00637 void
00638 Master::attr_get(ResponseCallbackAttrGet *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00639                  uint64_t handle, const char *name) {
00640   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00641   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00642   int error;
00643   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00644 
00645   if (m_verbose)
00646     HT_INFOF("attrget(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00647              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00648 
00649   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00650     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00651 
00652   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00653     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00654 
00655   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00656     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00657 
00658     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, dbuf))
00659       HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND, name);
00660 
00661     txn->commit(0);
00662   }
00663   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00664 
00665   StaticBuffer buffer(dbuf);
00666 
00667   if ((error = cb->response(buffer)) != Error::OK)
00668     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00669 }

00671 
00672 void
00673 Master::attr_del(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00674                  const char *name) {
00675   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00676   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00677   int error;
00678 
00679   if (m_verbose)
00680     HT_INFOF("attrdel(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00681              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00682 
00683   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00684     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00685 
00686   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00687     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00688 
00689 
00690   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00691     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00692 
00693     m_bdb_fs->del_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name);
00694 
00695     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL, name));
00696     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00697 
00698     txn->commit(0);
00699   }
00700   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00701 
00702   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00703     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00704 }
00705 
00706 
00707 void
00708 Master::exists(ResponseCallbackExists *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00709                const char *name) {
00710   int error;
00711   bool file_exists;
00712 
00713   if (m_verbose)
00714     HT_INFOF("exists(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00715 
00716   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00717 
00718   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00719     file_exists = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name);
00720     txn->commit(0);
00721   }
00722   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00723 
00724   if ((error = cb->response(file_exists)) != Error::OK)
00725     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00726 }

00729 void
00730 Master::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00731                 uint64_t handle) {
00732   std::string abs_name;
00733   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00734   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00735   DirEntry dentry;
00736   std::vector<DirEntry> listing;
00737 
00738   if (m_verbose)
00739     HT_INFOF("readdir(session=%llu, handle=%llu)",
00740              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00741 
00742   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00743     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00744 
00745   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00746     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00747 
00748 
00749   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00750     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00751     m_bdb_fs->get_directory_listing(txn, handle_data->node->name, listing);
00752     txn->commit(0);
00753   }
00754   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00755 
00756   cb->response(listing);
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void
00761 Master::lock(ResponseCallbackLock *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00762              uint32_t mode, bool try_lock) {
00763   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00764   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00765   bool notify = true;
00766 
00767   if (m_verbose) {
00768     HT_INFOF("lock(session=%llu, handle=%llu, mode=0x%x, try_lock=%d)",
00769              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, mode, try_lock);
00770   }
00771 
00772   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00773     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00774     return;
00775   }
00776 
00777   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00778     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00779               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00780     return;
00781   }
00782 
00783   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK)) {
00784     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00785               "handle not open for locking");
00786     return;
00787   }
00788 
00789   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_WRITE)) {
00790     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00791               "handle not open for writing");
00792     return;
00793   }
00794 
00795   {
00796     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00797     NodeData::LockRequestList &pending_lock_reqs =
00798         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs;
00799 
00800     if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00801       if (try_lock)
00802         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00803       else {
00804         pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00805         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00806       }
00807       return;
00808     }
00809     else if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED) {
00810       if (mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00811         if (try_lock)
00812           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00813         else {
00814           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00815           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00816         }
00817         return;
00818       }
00819 
00820       assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED);
00821 
00822       if (!pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00823         if (try_lock)
00824           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00825         else {
00826           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00827           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00828         }
00829         return;
00830       }
00831     }
00832 
00833     // at this point we're OK to acquire the lock
00834     if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED &&
00835         !handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00836       notify = false;
00837 
00838     handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00839 
00840     HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00841       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
00842                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00843       txn->commit(0);
00844     }
00845     HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00846 
00847     handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = mode;
00848     lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00849 
00850     // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00851     if (notify) {
00852       HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockAcquired(mode));
00853       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr);
00854     }
00855 
00856     cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED, handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00857   }
00858 }
00859 
00863 void Master::lock_handle(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, uint32_t mode) {
00864   if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00865     handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.insert(handle_data->id);
00866   else {
00867     assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE);
00868     handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = handle_data->id;
00869   }
00870   handle_data->locked = true;
00871 }
00872 
00876 void
00877 Master::lock_handle_with_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
00878                                       uint32_t mode, bool wait_for_notify) {
00879   lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00880 
00881   // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00882   HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockGranted(mode,
00883                            handle_data->node->lock_generation));
00884   deliver_event_notification(handle_data, event, wait_for_notify);
00885 }
00886 
00887 
00888 
00892 void
00893 Master::release(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00894   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00895   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00896 
00897   if (m_verbose) {
00898     HT_INFOF("release(session=%llu, handle=%llu)",
00899              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00900   }
00901 
00902   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00903     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00904     return;
00905   }
00906 
00907   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00908     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00909               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00910     return;
00911   }
00912 
00913   release_lock(handle_data);
00914 
00915   cb->response_ok();
00916 }
00917 
00918 
00919 void Master::release_lock(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, bool wait_for_notify) {
00920   ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00921   vector<HandleDataPtr> next_lock_handles;
00922   int next_mode = 0;
00923 
00924   if (handle_data->locked) {
00925     if (handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle != 0) {
00926       assert(handle_data->id == handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle);
00927       handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = 0;
00928     }
00929     else {
00930       unsigned int count = handle_data->node->
00931           shared_lock_handles.erase(handle_data->id);
00932       HT_ASSERT(count);
00933     }
00934     handle_data->locked = false;
00935   }
00936   else
00937     return;
00938 
00939   // deliver LOCK_RELEASED notifications if no more locks held on node
00940   if (handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty()) {
00941     HT_INFO("About to deliver lock released notifications");
00942     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockReleased());
00943     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr, wait_for_notify);
00944     HT_INFO("Finished delivering lock released notifications");
00945   }
00946 
00947   handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = 0;
00948 
00949   if (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00950     HandleDataPtr next_handle;
00951     const LockRequest &front_lock_req = handle_data->node->
00952         pending_lock_reqs.front();
00953     if (front_lock_req.mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00954       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00955       if (get_handle_data(front_lock_req.handle, next_handle))
00956         next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
00957       handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
00958     }
00959     else {
00960       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00961       do {
00962         const LockRequest &lockreq = handle_data->node->
00963             pending_lock_reqs.front();
00964         if (lockreq.mode != LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00965           break;
00966         if (get_handle_data(lockreq.handle, next_handle))
00967           next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
00968         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
00969       } while (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty());
00970     }
00971 
00972     if (!next_lock_handles.empty()) {
00973       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00974 
00975       HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00976         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
00977                                 handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00978         txn->commit(0);
00979       }
00980       HT_BDBTXN_END();
00981 
00982       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = next_mode;
00983 
00984       for (size_t i=0; i<next_lock_handles.size(); i++) {
00985         assert(handle_data->id != next_lock_handles[i]->id);
00986         lock_handle_with_notification(next_lock_handles[i], next_mode,
00987                                       wait_for_notify);
00988       }
00989 
00990       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00991       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(next_mode));
00992       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event, wait_for_notify);
00993     }
00994   }
00995 }
00996 
00997 
01001 void
01002 Master::deliver_event_notifications(NodeData *node,
01003     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01004   int notifications = 0;
01005 
01006   // log event
01007   for (HandleMap::iterator iter = node->handle_map.begin();
01008        iter != node->handle_map.end(); ++iter) {
01009     /*
01010     HT_DEBUGF("Delivering notification (%d == %d)", (*iter).second->event_mask,
01011               event_ptr->get_mask());
01012     */
01013     if ((*iter).second->event_mask & event_ptr->get_mask()) {
01014       (*iter).second->session_data->add_notification(
01015           new Notification((*iter).first, event_ptr));
01016       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01017           (*iter).second->session_data->id);
01018       notifications++;
01019     }
01020   }
01021 
01022   if (wait_for_notify && notifications)
01023     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01024 }
01025 
01026 
01030 void
01031 Master::deliver_event_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
01032     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01033 
01034   // log event
01035   handle_data->session_data->add_notification(
01036       new Notification(handle_data->id, event_ptr));
01037   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01038       handle_data->session_data->id);
01039 
01040   if (wait_for_notify)
01041     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01042 
01043 }
01044 
01045 
01046 
01050 bool
01051 Master::find_parent_node(const std::string &normal_name,
01052                          NodeDataPtr &parent_node, std::string &child_name) {
01053   NodeMap::iterator node_it;
01054   size_t last_slash = normal_name.rfind("/", normal_name.length());
01055 
01056   child_name.clear();
01057 
01058   if (last_slash > 0) {
01059     ScopedLock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01060     std::string parent_name(normal_name, 0, last_slash);
01061     child_name.append(normal_name, last_slash + 1,
01062                       normal_name.length() - last_slash - 1);
01063     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01064 
01065     if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01066       parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01067     else {
01068       parent_node = new NodeData();
01069       parent_node->name = parent_name;
01070       m_node_map[parent_name] = parent_node;
01071     }
01072     return true;
01073   }
01074   else if (last_slash == 0) {
01075     ScopedLock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01076     std::string parent_name = "/";
01077     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01078     assert (node_it != m_node_map.end());
01079     child_name.append(normal_name, 1, normal_name.length() - 1);
01080     parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01081     return true;
01082   }
01083 
01084   return false;
01085 }
01086 
01087 
01091 bool
01092 Master::destroy_handle(uint64_t handle, int *errorp, std::string &errmsg,
01093                        bool wait_for_notify) {
01094   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
01095   unsigned int refcount = 0;
01096 
01097   if (!remove_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
01098     *errorp = Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
01099     errmsg = std::string("handle=") + handle;
01100     return false;
01101   }
01102 
01103   {
01104     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
01105 
01106     handle_data->node->remove_handle(handle_data->id);
01107     refcount = handle_data->node->reference_count();
01108   }
01109 
01110   release_lock(handle_data, wait_for_notify);
01111 
01112   if (refcount == 0) {
01113 
01114     if (handle_data->node->ephemeral) {
01115       std::string child_name;
01116       NodeDataPtr parent_node;
01117 
01118       if (find_parent_node(handle_data->node->name, parent_node, child_name)) {
01119         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
01120                                                 child_name));
01121         deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event, wait_for_notify);
01122       }
01123 
01124       // remove file from database
01125       HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01126         m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, handle_data->node->name);
01127         txn->commit(0);
01128       }
01129       HT_BDBTXN_END(false);
01130 
01131       // remove node
01132       NodeMap::iterator node_it = m_node_map.find(handle_data->node->name);
01133 
01134       if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01135         m_node_map.erase(node_it);
01136     }
01137   }
01138 
01139   return true;
01140 }
01141 
01142 
01145 void Master::get_generation_number() {
01146 
01147   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01148     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01149                                  &m_generation))
01150       m_generation = 0;
01151 
01152     m_generation++;
01153     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01154                             m_generation);
01155     txn->commit(0);
01156   }
01157   HT_BDBTXN_END();
01158 }
